products.labelDisapprovedText: Your product has been disapproved because of following reasons:
products.labelTextDialog: Your Product is in marketing analysis where our team defines marketing strategies of your product. After this If your product approved; it will be pushed live.
products.labeldeleteAlertText: Are you sure you want to delete?
products.labelNoProducts: No products have been added yet!
products.descPendingReview: We have received your sample. Our team will review your product as soon as possible. Normally it will take 1-2 business days.
products.descUnderMarketingAnalysis: Your product is being analyzed by our marketing experts where they will define marketing strategies. After this, if your product is approved, it will be pushed live.
products.descInReview: Your Product is currently reviewed by our expert team. We will match your product with our approval checklist and if it matches all the criteria we will send it for financial analysis.
products.descReceived: We have received the sample product. The product will go through multiple processes in order to get approved. We will update you once the approval process starts.
products.descFinancialAnalysis: Your product is being analyzed by our financial experts where they will define financial strategies. After this, if your product is approved, it will be pushed for marketing analysis.
products.descPendingAssets: Our analysis team is done with the analysis and creative team has begun the process of adding the assets. This will take 1-2 business days to complete the process.
products.descPendingContent: Our content team is in process of adding the content for the product. This will take 1-2 business days to complete the process.
products.descPendingInventory: We have requested the required inventory in order to make the product live on Wahhao Store.
products.descInTransit: Product is on the way. Our team will update once it reaches our warehouse.
products.noSaved: No products have been added yet
products.noDataText: You will need to send samples to our fulfillment center for approval prior to going live.
products.noDataDesc: Adding and managing information of your products will be handled our team and you will be notified once your products are approved
products.descApproved: Congratulations!! Your product is approved by our team. You can now preview your product.
products.descDisapproved: Your product is not approved by our analysis team, we are sorry to let you know about this. Please Try Again with a new product.
products.labelDeleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
